results.title: Small business: the company you keep
results.creator_credit: BBC-TV, Tony Matthews and Paul Ellis
results.brief_description: How to approach the problems of delegation, staff selection, and the future management of the company. As a business grows, those at the top must learn a new role. In addition to delegation, which is examined from several angles, there are important problems of communication and industrial relations.

results.title: Small body of still water
results.creator_credit: Film Australia, Don Murray and Dietmar Fill
results.brief_description: A pond is a small body of still water. Within this environment the life support elements of sun, water and oxygen enable the process of photosynthesis to take place, upon which much of the life in and around the pond is dependent.

results.title: Small boat safety: stowage, care and use of life-saving equipment
results.brief_description:
Demonstrates the do’s and don’ts of storing, caring and using life-saving equipment in small boats.
Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.

results.title: Small boat safety
results.brief_description: The objective of this film is to increase recognition of small boat and pleasure craft hazards and to demonstrate sound safety practice to boating, water skiing, youth and community groups.

results.title: Small ant syndrome
results.brief_description: Delightful animated story with warmth and humour about one-up-manship in the microcosmic world of ants. Simplistic in its presentation but fascinating to watch. Sound effects with music soundtrack - music by David Jaedyn Conley.

results.title: Small animals protect themselves
results.brief_description: Observes the grasshopper, dragonfly, snail, ladybird beetle and other small animals in their natural surroundings. Indicates the various ways in ;which tiny animals and insects protect themselves from natural enemies.

results.title: Smacks and kicks
results.brief_description: A black comedy played out over a middle-class dining table. The weapons in this family war are choc wedges and mashed potato, indifference and lack of communication.

results.title: Slys = Slyss
results.brief_description: An unusual safety film without spoken commentary, tracing the complete story of one particular accident involving a young cyclist. We follow the ambulance over icy roads to the accident, the return journey to the hospital where examination, x-ray and operation take place. Only when the girl’s companion visits the hospital do we learn that carelessness was the cause.

results.title: Slum clearance in the thirties: the film evidence
results.brief_description: Critically examines documentaries, newsreels and propaganda films which dealt with pre-war public housing and slum clearances in Britain and assesses their reality. Includes postwar footage and a complete 1942 documentary about redevelopment made by the Ministry of Information ‘New Towns for Old’.
